title: Green chicken curry with coconut sambal
ingredients: 450g pkt Coles Made Easy Thai Green Chicken Stir Fry with Capsicum and Green Beans
250g pkt Coles Coconut Chilli Lime Rice
steps: Heat the oil in a wok or large deep frying pan over medium heat. Add the chicken mixture and cook, stirring occasionally, for 8 mins. Add 1/4 cup (60ml) of water and cook for 2 mins or until the chicken is cooked through.
Meanwhile, heat the rice in the microwave following packet directions.
To make the coconut sambal, combine the coriander, onion, coconut and lime juice in a small bowl. Season.
Divide rice and curry between serving bowls. Sprinkle with the coconut sambal.

title: Slow-cooker cauliflower korma
ingredients: Long fresh green chilli, sliced, to serve
steps: Whisk together the stock, passata and korma paste in a slow cooker. Place the cauliflower upside down in the mixture and turn to coat. Stand upright and cover. Cook on low for 5 hours or until the cauliflower is tender.

Baste the cauliflower with the liquid in the slow cooker. Combine the yoghurt, cream and cornflour in a small jug. Add to the slow cooker and stir to combine. Cook for a further 10 minutes or until the sauce has thickened.
Serve cauliflower sprinkled with tomato, chilli, coriander and almonds. Serve with roti, if using.

title: Avocado and cucumber salad
steps: Combine salad leaves, avocado, onion and cucumber in a bowl. Place lemon juice and oil in a screw-top jar. Season with salt.
